data.name: Dark Rose Valkyrie: New Mission Addition Set / 新規任務追加パック / 新任務追加包
data.detailed_description:
Unlock new missions with the New Mission Addition Set.

・Sakimi Research Facility B3 Area will be opened within Sakimi Research Facility.
※You will be able to advance if you have defeated the boss enemy in Sakimi Research Facility B2.

・Ryoumori Research Facility B3 Area will be opened within Ryoumori Research Facility.
※You will be able to accept the additional missions after completing a certain mission.

・Tsukushidai Research Facility B4 Area will be opened within Tsukushidai Research Facility.
※You will be able to accept the additional missions after completing a certain mission.

・Tsukinosaki Research Facility B4 Area will be opened within Tsukinosaki Research Facility.
※You will be able to accept the additional missions after completing a certain mission.

New missions will be added to the [Command Room].

※Uninstalling DLC items may prevent users from loading save files made before the DLC item was uninstalled. To ensure that users can load all Dark Rose Valkyrie save files, we recommend that users do NOT uninstall DLC items.

・Tsukushidai Research Facility B4 Area will be opened within Tsukushidai Research Facility.

・Tsukinosaki Research Facility B4 Area will be opened within Tsukinosaki Research Facility.

New missions will be added to the [Command Room].

※Uninstalling DLC items may prevent users from loading save files made before the DLC item was uninstalled. To ensure that users can load all Dark Rose Valkyrie save files, we recommend that users do NOT uninstall DLC items.
data.short_description: Unlock new missions with the New Mission Addition Set.

fullgame.name: Dark Rose Valkyrie / クロバラノワルキューレ / 黑玫瑰女武神

data.supported_languages:
English*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1GB VRAM or more and compatibility with Direct X 11.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960, ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible sound card
